short_description: sliding core discs work to engage and strengthen your core. They are dual-sided for use on both carpet and hard floors and are ideal for home exercise to incorporate into your workout routine.
These gliding discs work to engage and strengthen the core muscles to target key muscles with a variety of exercises such as lunges, squats and upper-body movement.
Fitness sliders are reversible for use on both carpet and hardwood floors, so they can be used most anywhere and on-the-go, whether in the comfort of your home or your local gym.

These compact and lightweight workout pads for floor can be taken to gym classes or different areas of your home gym. They are an easy workout equipment so you can exercise when it's convenient for you.
The discs are sold as a pair and have two different materials on either side for both carpet areas and hardwood floors. They are durable and made to withstand daily exercise.
